After seven successful years of fostering entrepreneurship through PRIME, the Meghalaya Government is preparing to launch a renewed Startup Policy aimed at enabling scalable, innovation-driven growth. During a recent roundtable, officials and stakeholders highlighted the need for deeper ecosystem engagement, sharper financial incentives, and solutions for societal and environmental challenges. 

The upcoming policy aims to enhance market access, value chain integration, and collaboration with educational institutions. With a special focus on agri-tech, tourism, digital services, and traditional crafts, Meghalaya‚Äôs vision is clear: empower startups, elevate livelihoods, and build a future-ready economy anchored in sustainability and innovation.

Read more: http://bit.ly/4lajYEG

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #StartupNews #Collaboration #MeghalayaStartups

India has officially surpassed 1.85 lakh DPIIT recognised startups, reinforcing its position as the third-largest startup ecosystem in the world. Unlike earlier years, today‚Äôs growth is inclusive, with at least 1 women-led startups and 40% from Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities. 

Schemes like SISFS and FFS have paved the way for easy capital access, enabling over 118 unicorns and 17.6 lakh jobs. This isn‚Äôt just a surge in startups, it‚Äôs a shift in how India builds, scales, and leads in the global economy. And the journey has only just begun.

IKP Knowledge Park is proud to share that Dr. Vithal K Lakkineni, Ph.D. from the Technology Transfer Office at IKP PRIME was invited to speak at the AICTE Faculty Development Program on Innovation and Entrepreneurship held at Vignan's University (Deemed to be), Guntur, on 25th July 2025. 

Huge congratulations to Sandeep Satheesan CEO - Technology Business Incubator- Vignan, Vigan team Abdul R, Vijaya Ramu Dirisala, Dean,¬†Pavan Kumar Kakumanu and Dr. Krishna Harshitha, Dr Kiranmayi Chanduri.
 
The knowledge-sharing session brought together a dynamic group of professors from MBA and BBA institutions. The workshop saw enthusiastic participation and insightful discussions around the innovation ecosystem, the evolving role of educational institutions in nurturing young entrepreneurs, and how faculty members can become effective startup mentors.

The workshop emphasised how faculty in Tier-2 cities can mentor startups from ideation to market. A key focus was on grassroots innovations in AgriTech, nutraceuticals, and food technologies, aligning institutional efforts with community needs. Participants were encouraged to build local innovation ecosystems and foster collaborations with government agencies. 

This workshop reinforced IKP PRIME's commitment to building inclusive innovation ecosystems and strengthened the connection between education, entrepreneurship, and impactful innovation.

Deepanwita Chattopadhyay Bindu Nishal Viswanadham Duppatla Dr. Priyankana Mukherjee Apoorva Bhatnagar Sridhar Ramanathan IKP EDEN Aaqib Jameel Dedeepya Chermala Vishaka Sawan Ranajit Sen Anuradha Barua Sudha Kalyani Bommareddy, Ph.D. Rohika B Rajeswari Sepana Shreyas Kudva

India is entering a new era of biomedical research, and the i3 Summit ‚Äì ‡§µ‡§ø‡§Æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂, hosted by Blockchain for Impact (BFI), marked a powerful step forward.

Bringing together leaders from science, industry, and government, the summit spotlighted how collaboration can accelerate translational research and drive healthcare innovation for all.

IKP was proud to be part of this important conversation shaping the future of biomedical innovation in India.

Deepanwita Chattopadhyay, was invited as a panellist to contribute to the panel "Indian Healthcare Innovation & Its Translation ‚Äì Crossing Chasms & Bridging Gaps", sharing key insights on speeding the journey from research to real-world impact. She was joined by Dr. Sridhar Ramanathan, Dr. Viswanadham Duppatla, and Aaqib Jameel.

With initiatives like the BFI-BIOME Network gaining momentum, we look forward to contributing to a resilient, inclusive, and innovation-driven healthcare ecosystem for India and beyond.

In a landmark move for biotechnology education in the North-East, Assam Agricultural University (AAU) inaugurated the region‚Äôs first of its kind integrated BTech-MTech programme in Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBBT). Gracing the occasion virtually, Dr. Jitendra Kumar, Managing Director, BIRAC, addressed the gathering and underscored the importance of such academic initiatives in nurturing innovation and advancing India‚Äôs biotechnology ecosystem.¬†Dr. Kumar will also be contributing as the Guest Faculty for the integrated course. As a key partner in fostering research-driven growth, #BIRAC‚Äôs continued support reinforces the government‚Äôs vision of tapping into the region‚Äôs immense biological diversity and scientific potential.

Congratulations to CCAMP supported startup Biomoneta for winning the Silver Award at Medicall 2025, India's largest medical equipment and hospital needs expo. 

https://lnkd.in/guafRDhz

They participated with their dual infection-preventative technologies for use in the hospital environment to protect the immuno-compromised against hospital acquired infections or HAIs, a silent cause of many mortalities. 

Zebox, a powerful air sterilising device and qAMI - an AI/ML based platform for detection and measurement of airborne pathogenic load encompassing multiple microbes. 

Biomoneta is a cohort of CCAMP Department of Health and Social Care

We‚Äôre proud to share that our portfolio startup Mitigata‚Ñ¢ - Smart cyber insurance has raised $5.9M in Series A funding, led by Nexus Venture Partners. üöÄ

Founded in 2021 by Mohit Anand, Sarthak Dubey, Mayank Morya, and Akshit Kaushik, Mitigata is a cutting-edge cyber-insurance and cybersecurity startup. It offers an AI-powered platform that integrates cybersecurity, risk management, and insurance into a single, robust solution tailored for Indian enterprises.

Mitigata‚Äôs digital tools are built to prevent hacks, identity theft, and other online threats‚Äîoffering comprehensive protection for businesses and individuals alike.

IIT Mandi Catalyst organized a curated workshop focused on 'Funding Schemes for Startups.' The workshop, skillfully led by Mr. Gaurav P., Associate General Manager at IIT Mandi Catalyst, aimed to empower founders by introducing the funding opportunities provided by IIT Mandi Catalyst.

The session emphasized seed investments, grants, and eligibility criteria tailored to different business phases. Discussions focused on aligning funding needs with growth stages, crafting persuasive proposals, and understanding investor expectations. Gaurav Parulkar's expertise provided startups with actionable insights, highlighting strategic approaches to leverage financial resources effectively for sustainable growth.

üì¢ ¬†IIT Mandi Catalyst is pleased to invite applications for the Investment Readiness Program.

Join our Investment Readiness Program, a dynamic initiative designed for startups poised for commercialization and ready to secure investments for expansion. This program serves as a vital bridge between startups and the market, offering invaluable support and guidance to accelerate growth.

Program Highlights:
üîπ Craft a compelling pitch tailored for investors.
üîπ Benefit from personalized mentorship by industry experts.
üîπ Validate the financial viability and growth strategy of your venture.
üîπ Showcase your startup to potential investors on Demo Day.
üîπ Refine your pitch with feedback from seasoned professionals.

Demo Day:
Cap off your 90-day sprint with Demo Day, where cohort startups gain exclusive access to a curated audience of venture capitalists, angel investors, and grant providers. This is your chance to shine as you pitch your venture to influential stakeholders, paving the way for potential investments and strategic partnerships.

Don't miss this opportunity to propel your startup to new heights. Join our Investment Readiness Program and unlock the resources and connections you need to thrive in the competitive market landscape.

üìÖ Last date to apply: August 7th, 2025

üëâ To apply for the program, click on the following link: https://lnkd.in/gDYCbEeE

Meet Rishabh Ravichandran, Co-Founder of Ekatvam Innovations , a startup of Impact Orbit- Tech-Enabled Social Innovations, an initiative by Capgemini in partnership NSRCEL.

Ekatvam is making water management data centric and sustainable in rural/semi-urban areas through a multi-stakeholder decision support tool named MIDAS. It is helping the target communities understand their local water balance, on a monthly basis, and decide how best to optimize its use and conservation through science-based data and analytics.

Learn more about what how Impact Orbit is helping social innovators here- https://lnkd.in/gfTB4upJ

üåç Thank You, Tony Loaiza! ‚ú®

We were honored to host Tony Loaiza, Silicon Valley-based CEO and seasoned entrepreneur, for an inspiring and eye-opening workshop on Startup Culture & Best Practices, with a special focus on the U.S. innovation and networking ecosystem.

Tony shared his wealth of experience around:
 üîπ Emerging tech trends in the global market
 üîπ Strategic networking and positioning in the USA
 üîπ Revenue growth frameworks, including the innovative Revenue as a Service (RaaS) model
 üîπ Practical lessons from building and exiting multiple companies

The session gave our founders a rare insider‚Äôs view into the mindset, agility, and strategy that define globally successful startups, and how Indian entrepreneurs can adapt these best practices to scale internationally.

Thank you, Tony, for generously sharing your journey and empowering our startup community to think global and act bold! üåêüöÄ

Neha brings with her a wealth of experience as the Founder of PURPLE PANDA FASHIONS PRIVATE LIMITED(formerly Clovia). https://www.linkedin.com/company/social-.text:
The M S Swaminathan Research Foundation has announced a ‚Çπ10M challenge for entrepreneurs in partnership with Social Alpha, a non-profit development platform that helps early-stage science and technology firms. This announcement is a significant boost to #agritech innovation.

The challenge will be announced during the MS Swaminathan International Centenary Conference, which will honor the 100th anniversary of the birth of Professor MS Swaminathan, the Father of India's Green Revolution and awardee of the Bharat Ratna award.  

The theme of the conference, which Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate in New Delhi, is "Evergreen Revolution- The Pathway to Bio Happiness."

This centenary meeting is a call to action as much as a celebration of Professor MS Swaminathan.  

We require bold, science-led solutions based on equity and sustainability as we address climate change, biodiversity loss, and rural hardship.  

That vision is reflected in the Agritech Grand Challenge, which supports ideas that are pro-poor, pro-nature, and based on farmer wisdom, Soumya Swaminathan told media Thursday.

‚û°Ô∏è Follow us for more such updates: Your AgriStory 

#MSSwaminathanResearchFoundation #SocialAlpha #Agritech #agritechinnovationchallenge

What does it really take to solve a complex, systemic problem end to end? 

In this article, Manoj shares why Social Alpha was designed as a full-stack platform. Not to do everything, but to take responsibility where the system falls short. 

When your goal is to address poverty, climate, or disease, the traditional business playbook, focused on efficiency, specialisation, and competitive advantage, simply doesn‚Äôt hold. The market fails, repeatedly. And solving for that failure means stitching together what the market leaves behind: patient capital, translational research, community trust, policy alignment, and risk-sharing mechanisms. 

The full-stack approach isn‚Äôt about scale for its own sake. It‚Äôs about staying with the problem long enough to build the bridge, and then knowing when to step away. 

A powerful read on what it means to build for impact, systemically. 

Sustain Plus | Ganesh Neelam | Smita Rakesh | Dr Kavita Singh | Neeraj Jain | Harish Hande
 
#InvestedInImpact #PeoplePlanetProgress #FullStackDevelopment #SocialAlpha

Exciting News! The M.S. Swaminathan Foundation and Social Alpha are launching a ‚Çπ1 crore Agritech Innovation Challenge ‚¨áÔ∏è 

Join us at the M.S. Swaminathan International Centenary Conference on August 8th for a press briefing led by Manoj Kumar, Founder of Social Alpha, as we unveil this initiative focused on breakthrough solutions for agriculture and rural development - from soil health to supporting smallholder farmers.

Stay tuned for more details on this groundbreaking opportunity for innovators who are passionate about transforming Indian agriculture.

#AgritechInnovation #MSSwaminathan #SocialAlpha #RuralDevelopment #Agriculture #Innovation #MSS100 #Agritech

National Academy of Agricultural Sciences -NAAS India | ICAR- Indian Council of Agricultural Research | Indian Agricultural Research Institute | Indian National Science Academy - INSA | Department of Biotechnology | Department of Science & Technology, Government of India | CGIAR | World Food Programme | FAO

Join us for a conversation that will redefine what's possible for entrepreneurs in emerging towns.
Our distinguished Founder, Dr. Gururaj Desh Deshpande, Deshpande Foundation, will be joined by Umesh Rudrapatna, Founder of Gridflow, who will moderate a discussion on "Big Dreams, Emerging Towns: The Rise of Bharat‚Äôs Builders."
Event Details:

Day and Date: Saturday, August 9, 2025
Time: 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM
Venue: Auditorium, Deshpande Startups, Hubballi
Mode: Physical
Register before August 7, 2025, to join this inspiring fireside chat.

Click the link to register: https://lnkd.in/g4MpN-VC

#GururajDeshDeshpande #DeshpandeStartups #StartupEcosystem #BharatBuilders

Desh Deshpande | Raju Reddy | Phanindra Sama | Bharat Singh | Rachit Parekh | Ramanathan (Ram) Narayanan | Umesh Rudrapatna | Gridflow Technologies Pvt Ltd

Manish Jaiswal | Sahiti Meduri | Yash Mittal | Rashmi Joshi | Soumya Chaugala | Chetan Madivalar | Neelappa Hebasur | Varadh Kulkarni | Satya Illa

Ready to redefine your startup's growth? Unlock a world of opportunities in India's emerging tech hub with Bridge2Bharat-Hubballi!

Gain access to extensive infrastructure, a skilled talent pool, C-suite mentorship, and exclusive VC connects. We're here to help you redefine success in one of India's most dynamic emerging hubs.

Ready to scale your startup? 

Fill out our form to get started, 
Form: https://lnkd.in/gbJWxdCR
To know more, visit: https://lnkd.in/grttaiye

Desh Deshpande | Raju Reddy | Phanindra Sama Bharat Singh | Rachit Parekh | Ramanathan (Ram) Narayanan |  Manish Jaiswal 
Sahiti Meduri | Yash Mittal | Rashmi Joshi | Soumya Chaugala | Chetan Madivalar |  Neelappa | Varadh Kulkarni 

#Bridge2Bharat #DeshpandeStartups  #StartupEcosystem #Growth #Entrepreneurship

2 Founders. 2 Experts. One Topic = 2+2 Model!

At Deshpande Startups, we‚Äôre rethinking how meaningful founder conversations should happen. Most traditional formats‚Äîsuch as panels or one-on-ones‚Äîtend to fall short. They're either too surface-level or disconnected from the realities of building in Bharat.

That‚Äôs why we introduced the 2+2 model:
¬†‚Ä¢ 2 early-stage founders
¬†‚Ä¢ 2 seasoned experts
One open, unscripted conversation‚Äîwhere ideas collide, perspectives challenge, and learning flows both ways.

We put this model into action with our first session on ‚ÄúEnabling Founders Beyond Metros ‚Äì The ONDC Opportunity,‚Äù Moderated by¬†Rashmi Joshi

As ONDC opens new pathways for inclusive digital commerce, we explored what it truly takes to enable founders building from beyond Tier 1 cities.

Experts:¬†Nandita Sharma¬†&¬†Sachin Korla
Founders:¬†Basanth Verma¬†¬†&¬†Manjunath Gogi

What it unlocks:
This initiative builds trust by fostering safe, direct conversations without posturing. It brings together experts from diverse fields like policy, design, and commerce to tackle challenges beyond a single product. This curation of different perspectives challenges assumptions, revealing that issues often stem from cultural or trust barriers rather than tech problems.

Big thanks to all four speakers and special appreciation to Nandita Sharma for her ONDC-wide insights that brought structure and momentum.

More 2+2 sessions coming soon!

Rashmi Joshi | Manish Jaiswal

We‚Äôre delighted to share that Neuranics Lab has successfully completed the implementation and certification of the ISO 13485 Quality Management System! This marks a major milestone in their journey to develop a patented, rapid multispectral imaging and AI-based analytics device for blood analysis, parasite detection, and more. They are now entering an exciting phase, where they complete clinical studies, secure regulatory permissions and hit the market.

The RIFC Regulatory Information and Facilitation Center at Venture Center, played a key role in helping the team establish, implement, and achieve ISO 13485 certification. Reflecting on the experience, Praveen Kumar Bhagat, CEO of Neuranics Lab, says:

Ready-to-Use Labs, Offices, and Desks and much more at India's largest incubator for science and technology based startups! Come.... ùó∂ùóªùó∞ùòÇùóØùóÆùòÅùó≤ ùòÑùó∂ùòÅùóµ ùòÇùòÄ!

Venture Center is an award winning, leading incubator for deeptech, knowledge intensive startups, and our ùó•ùó≤ùòÄùó∂ùó±ùó≤ùóªùòÅ ùóúùóªùó∞ùòÇùóØùóÆùòÅùó∂ùóºùóª ùó£ùóøùóºùó¥ùóøùóÆùó∫ for startups offers a range of benefits‚Äîwithout taking any equity!

1. World-Class Infrastructure

Access to state-of-the-art labs, fully equipped offices, and flexible desks. Our facilities are designed to meet the diverse needs of startups, providing everything you need to innovate and grow.

2. Expert Mentorship and Guidance

24/7 access to in-house expertise, in addition to customized one-on-one mentoring from industry veterans. 

3. Funding Opportunities

Access to seed funds, CSR funds, and government grants for different stages of your journey.

4. Prime Location

We are based in Pune, a city known for its thriving tech and innovation scene, and we are in close proximity to prestigious educational institutions and research centers. 

5. Comprehensive Ecosystem

Our extensive support network includes legal assistance, business development resources, regulatory and IP support, and access to workshops and events that provide valuable insights and networking opportunities. 

6. Vibrant peer group community on our campus

Surround yourself with like-minded innovators and entrepreneurs who can inspire and support your startup journey.

Join us for Flavours & Futures, a hands-on culinary workshop by VentureStudio and Ahmedabad University‚Äôs Food Services and Nutrition Team. Explore gastronomy through teamwork, taste, and creativity. Led by Executive Chef Rahul Bhale!

50+ innovators spent their Saturday joining us for an AI deep-dive. The venue? A buzzing classroom at the School of Arts and Sciences, Ahmedabad University. The mission? Master everything from LLMs to building working AI agents.

The journey:
Morning: Demystifying how large language models actually work
Midday: Lunch from Chef Rahul Bhale
Afternoon: Building AI agents using n8n (freshly minted batch of coders!)

What made it special: 
‚úì Hands-on learning, not just theory 
‚úì Zero technical background needed 
‚úì Everyone left with new AI skills

Huge thanks to Jash Rathod for facilitation and every single participant who showed the dedication to invest a full Saturday in upskilling.

The best part? This is just the beginning.

We're committed to making cutting-edge tech accessible to our community through regular workshops like these.

Want to join our next session? Follow VentureStudio to be the first to know about upcoming workshops.

#GenerativeAI #AIWorkshop #VentureStudio #Innovation #AIEducation #Upskilling

"Complex problems require multiple knowledge systems."

Welcome home, Ahmedabad University Class of 2029!

Yesterday, our Vice Chancellor, Professor Pankaj Chandra, reminded parents and students why interdisciplinary learning is the foundation of our future. 

When engineering meets humanities. When business embraces biotechnology. When art inspires science. That's where innovation lives.

Students, get ready to think beyond textbooks and dream beyond disciplines.

The future is yours to shape!

As a startup in the process of developing/ validating/ finalising a prototype, you need the right set of enabling factors in order to thrive. We provide you all the support you need, including a bouquet of schemes from a host of reputed government institutions. With iCreate Pro-Fund Gateway, you maximise your odds of securing funding support and giving your innovation a tangible shape.

Get holistic support for turning your prototype into a successful product:

- Business and technical mentorship
- Access to prototyping and digital innovation lab
- Incubation and funding support ranging from Rs 2 lakh to Rs 30 lakh
- Connections with investors, industry, and the startup ecosystem
- Hostel accommodation in our vibrant campus

Building a Safer Workplace at iCreate! 

At iCreate, safety is a priority we never compromise on. Our Admin team, led by Cdr Parimal Verma ‚Äì Head Administration and Ms sharwari Dalvi ‚Äì Supervisor - Facilities, recently organized a Fire Fighting and Safety Training session for all employees. We took a professional approach to safety by partnering with the experts at VISWAMBI SECURITY AGENCY PRIVATE LIMITED, an experienced security agency. Their expert trainers delivered a comprehensive session focusing on practical fire safety measures, emergency response protocols, and the correct use of firefighting equipment‚Äîensuring every team member is well-prepared for unforeseen situations.

#iCreateWithYou #WorkplaceSafety #FireSafety #EmployeeWellbeing #SafetyFirst #TeamiCreate

Avinash Punekar | Dr.Praveen D. | Dr. Raashid Saiyed | Dr. Sanjeev K Yadav | Hiiren Y. | Anish Chavda | Riya Singha | Anushka Raghuvanshi | Jaydeep Shah | Siddharth Pareek | Venushree Patel |
